name: immixGroup
tagline: Commercial Technologies for the Public Sector
description:
immixGroup helps technology companies do business with federal, state and local government agencies. Our four divisions deliver a unique combination of services including technology sales via preferred contract vehicles, innovative government channel programs, expert contract management consulting, and outsourced IT solutions.
Since 1997, we have supported hundreds of companies with the specialized resources and proven expertise they need to grow and manage their public sector business while providing government agencies with reliable access to leading commercial technology products and services.
